languages.text: "Хорошо, что вы отдаете себе в этом отчет. Милость Императора велика, Он дает своим раскаивающимся слугам исправить их ошибки... порой".

traits.locale_text: "Хорошо, что вы отдаете себе в этом отчет. Милость Императора велика, он дает своим раскаивающимся слугам исправить их ошибки... порой".

languages.text: "It is good that you acknowledge this. The Emperor, in His great mercy, lets His repentant servants rectify their mistakes... sometimes."
languages.original_text: "Хорошо, что вы отдаете себе в этом отчет. Милость Императора велика, Он дает своим раскаивающимся слугам исправить их ошибки... порой".

traits.locale_text: "It is good that you acknowledge this. The Emperor, in His great mercy, lets His repentant servants rectify their mistakes... sometimes."
"It is good that you acknowledge this. The Emperor, in His great mercy, lets His repentant servants rectify their mistakes... sometimes."
"It is good that you acknowledge this. The Emperor, in His great mercy, lets His repentant servants rectify their mistakes... sometimes."
"It is good that you acknowledge this. The Emperor, in His great mercy, lets His repentant servants rectify their mistakes... sometimes."
"It is good that you acknowledge this. The Emperor, in His great mercy, lets His repentant servants rectify their mistakes... sometimes."

languages.text: 「認めてもらえて結構。皇帝は、その寛大なお慈悲で、後悔の念を抱く臣下に対し、己の過ちを正す機会を与えてくださる…ときもある」
languages.original_text: "It is good that you acknowledge this. The Emperor, in His great mercy, lets His repentant servants rectify their mistakes... sometimes."

traits.locale_text: 「認めてもらえて結構。皇帝は、その寛大なお慈悲で、後悔の念を抱く臣下に対し、己の過ちを正す機会を与えてくださる…ときもある」

languages.original_text: "It is good that you acknowledge this. The Emperor, in His great mercy, lets His repentant servants rectify their mistakes... sometimes."

languages.text: “我很高兴你意识到了这点。伟大而悯慈的帝皇，会让祂悔悟的仆人弥补他们的错误……这样的机会并不多。”
languages.original_text: "It is good that you acknowledge this. The Emperor, in His great mercy, lets His repentant servants rectify their mistakes... sometimes."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴你意识到了这点。伟大而悯慈的帝皇，会让祂悔悟的仆人弥补他们的错误……这样的机会并不多。”

languages.text: «Me alegro de que lo reconozca. El Emperador, en su misericordia, permite que sus sirvientes arrepentidos rectifiquen sus errores... a veces».
languages.original_text: "It is good that you acknowledge this. The Emperor, in His great mercy, lets His repentant servants rectify their mistakes... sometimes."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro de que lo reconozca. El Emperador, en su misericordia, permite que sus sirvientes arrepentidos rectifiquen sus errores... a veces».

languages.text: « Heureux de voir que vous en êtes {mf|conscient|consciente}. Dans sa miséricorde, l'Empereur permet à ses serviteurs repentants de corriger leurs erreurs... parfois. »
languages.original_text: "It is good that you acknowledge this. The Emperor, in His great mercy, lets His repentant servants rectify their mistakes... sometimes."

traits.locale_text: « Heureux de voir que vous en êtes {mf|conscient|consciente}. Dans sa miséricorde, l'Empereur permet à ses serviteurs repentants de corriger leurs erreurs... parfois. »

languages.text: "Es ist gut, dass Ihr das anerkennt. Der Imperator lässt in seiner großen Gnade reuige Diener ihre Fehler wiedergutmachen ... manchmal."
languages.original_text: "It is good that you acknowledge this. The Emperor, in His great mercy, lets His repentant servants rectify their mistakes... sometimes."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist gut, dass Ihr das anerkennt. Der Imperator lässt in seiner großen Gnade reuige Diener ihre Fehler wiedergutmachen ... manchmal."

languages.text: "Bunu kabullenmen güzel. İmparator, sonsuz merhamet sahibidir ve suçlarını kabul eden hizmetkârlarının kimileyin hatalarını düzeltmesine müsaade eder."
languages.original_text: "It is good that you acknowledge this. The Emperor, in His great mercy, lets His repentant servants rectify their mistakes... sometimes."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu kabullenmen güzel. İmparator sonsuz merhamet sahibidir ve suçlarını kabul eden hizmetkârlarının hatalarını düzeltmelerine müsaade eder. Bazen."
